TITLE: Embedding Database
DEF: Database of precomputed language-model embeddings of texts for efficient retrieval
TASK: The Embedding Database pattern enhances the efficiency and precision of AI-oriented tasks by providing precomputed language model embeddings for quick retrieval. This pattern is beneficial due to its speed and the improved accuracy it brings to AI processes. Key challenges include storage management, maintaining data consistency, and implementing effective access control, which, if properly addressed, can assure optimal performance and data integrity.
